name: The Last Leaf Demo
description:
A short proof of concept demo of a 2D metroidvania game.

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Shift (On ground) - Dash
  • Shift (In air) - Dive
  • Left Click - Attack
  • Right Click - Block
  • When diving, hold Space Bar to roll on land.
